name: Space Shooter - XYZ Game Studios
description:
A cool easy game with some enemies, which you need to kill. The game is lightweight and easy to play. 

Your target is: Kill everyone, and move away so you won't get exploded by the enemy's bullets. 

You have sometimes an upgrade: So you will be faster / stronger.

The game is currently in early access(VERSION 1.0), and I hope you will enjoy that.

That is our very first game. Every donate is appreciated
